attributes.action: Call for Gavin Williamson to step down as Education secretary.
attributes.additional_details: Someone who attacks and blames the people he is in charge of, has no place being in charge. Last minute u turns, short notice, exam fiasco is all his and this governments fault, yet the education sector are the ones being blamed. The education sector deserves someone better to be in charge.
attributes.background: Call for Gavin Williamson to step down as Education secretary after his attack on schools and their provision of education during this 3rd lockdown and 2nd school closure.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
